Author: aristus
Content:
Great! Now let's use the same method to measure the length of the emperor's nose. :)

If you have Nexis or bizwire access, you could probably get hard numbers going.\n

Author: nostrademons
Content: I'm the tech lead.  I make all technology choices, figure out the overall system architecture, and so far have done all the programming (we may pull other founders over to some of the easier programming tasks later).  I did not have the original idea, nor do I have any talent at graphics design, so I'm glad I have cofounders for that part.
